name: cvs-svc-metrics-collector
description: Collects metrics from dynamodb and pushes to CloudWatch
author: Martin Kemp

scripts.local-package: npm run build && npm run package
scripts.package: mkdir ${ZIP_NAME} && cp package.json package-lock.json ${ZIP_NAME} && cp -r .build/src/* ${ZIP_NAME}/ && cd ${ZIP_NAME} && npm ci && rm package.json package-lock.json && zip -qr ../${ZIP_NAME}.zip . && cd .. && rm -rf ${ZIP_NAME}
scripts.sonar-scanner: npm run tslint && npm run test && sonar-scanner
scripts.security-checks: npm audit --audit-level=critical && git secrets --register-aws && git secrets --scan && git log -p | scanrepo
